name: Siren Head Encounter
description:
Siren head is a horror creature created by Trevor Henderson, 

https://www.instagram.com/trevorhenderson/?hl=en

It's able to mimic any sounds, and pretend to be a human made structure stand idle for days.

Siren Head Encounter is a brand new game we made to give you an experience of encountering Siren Head, as a normal pedestrian, having good times with friends in the woods, You need to explore the woods, figure out the direction, survive and save your friends in a fast changing weather environment, while  being the prey of Siren Head.

The game is not made to be easy, it is hard to survive from it!

Control: Keyboard and Mouse

Game play duration: 15 to 30 minutes.

Minimum System requirements

CPU: 2 core processor

RAM: 2048 MB RAM

GPU: compatible with OpenGL 3.0

OS: Windows 7 SP1, 64-bit

Store: 550 MB available space
